"""Create an assingment for the person depending credential request configuration
 Proxy: Assignee -- allow to update the related assignement"""
 
 # check the script is not called from a url
 if REQUEST is not None:
 return None
 
 person = context.getDestinationDecisionValue(portal_type="Person")
 organisation = context.getDestinationDecisionValue(portal_type="Organisation")
 
 assignment_configuration = {}
 #Look on current assignement
 old_role_list = context.portal_categories.role.getCategoryChildRelativeUrlList()
 # XXX remove the base 'role/'. A better way could be possible
 old_role_list = [x.replace('role/', '', 1) for x in old_role_list]
 for role in context.getRoleList():
 has_assignment = person.countFolder(portal_type='Assignment',
 role = role,
 validation_state = 'open')
 
 assignment_configuration[role] = bool(has_assignment)
 old_role_list.remove(role)
 
 #Close old assignement
 context.CredentialRequest_closePersonAssignment(old_role_list)
 
 #Initialisation
 assignment_duration = context.portal_preferences.getPreferredCredentialAssignmentDuration()
 today = DateTime()
 delay = today+assignment_duration
 
 organisation_url = organisation and organisation.getRelativeUrl() or None;
 for role,create_assingment in assignment_configuration.items():
 if create_assingment:
 assignment_for_website = person.newContent(
 portal_type='Assignment',
 title = '%s %s Assignment' % (context.getSite('').capitalize(), role.capitalize()),
 role = role,
 site = context.getSite(),
 activity = context.getActivityList(),
 function = context.getFunctionList(),
 destination = organisation_url,
 start_date = today,
 stop_date = delay
 )
 
 assignment_for_website.open()
 else:
 #Update assignment
 current_assignment_list = person.searchFolder(portal_type='Assignment',
 role = role,
 validation_state = 'open')
 for assignment in current_assignment_list:
 assignment.getObject().setStopDate(delay)
